original_title: Ben Caplan: The Second Album Story
overview: Join Ben Caplan on a whirlwind trip from Halifax to Montreal to Ottawa to create his second album. For Caplan there’s a necessity to record a new set of songs that live up to standard set by album number one and many questions to answer. What does it take to be successful in today’s music industry? Is there a place for ancient Klezmer musical style with modern music? How does Ben define success for himself? And will Ben conquer the mythical second album syndrome?
title: Ben Caplan: The Second Album Story
